name: Xion Mainnet
description:
XION is the first walletless L1 blockchain purpose built for consumer adoption through chain abstraction.

XION is the first walletless L1 blockchain purpose built for consumer adoption through chain abstraction. Utilizing protocol-level implementations related to abstracted accounts, signatures, fees, interoperability, and more, XION empowers developers to build secure, intuitive, and seamless user experiences.
